<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=1673) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
devotion spell ([_touch of corruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=654))

</column>

---

The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body. If your next action is to cast _touch of corruption_ on a living creature, the target is also [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute if it fails its save (enfeebled 2 if it critically fails).

<title level="2">Cruelty leads to...</title>
[Greater Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=1677)
name: Cruelty
